Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: We announced this deprecation last year some time. Users should be setting the `chaincode.builder` and `chaincode.<language>.runtime` settings in core.yaml or via environment variables.

Action.author: tongliofcary
Action.body: ~btl5037 Thanks for your comment. I will close this then.

Action.author: tongliofcary
Action.body: This behavior was due to a design choice and there is a work around of this problem.
